name: Waltz for Heaven
description:
there are only two danceable ghosts in the jam build! don't worry about the third one, they will find peace someday soon 🙏 [also web build doesn't work on Mac, sorry! please try the downloadable build instead]

made in a few days time for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023. not anywhere near complete (only two ghosts to dance with) but a nice little sample of what's to come. if you enjoy this little demo, please comment so we can be excited about making more for you!

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Q/E to turn
  • Enter/Spacebar to interact
Credits:
  • art by Cessia Castillo
  • music by Thom Haley
  • writing & programming by izzy kestrel
  • Lugati / Sans Type Font by 𝕶𝖚𝖑𝖙𝖚𝖗𝖊 𝕿𝖞𝖕𝖊
  • dialog box texture by mateo8421
  • and some modified assets/code from these tutorials:
    • 3D Code Dungeon Walkthrough in Under 15 Minutes
    • Complete Godot Rhythm Game Tutorial
  • made with Godot Engine 3
